file.name: Permissions.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    permission:
      title: Root Type for permission
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          description: service.resource.action
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        allowed_apis:
          description: APIs permission controls
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/allowed_api'
      example:
        name: prisma_access.config_mgmt.read
        description: The ability to read configurations snapshots.
        allowed_apis:
        - method: get
          path: /config/v1/config-versions
        - method: get
          path: /config/v1/jobs
    _pagination:
      required:
      - count
      - items
      type: object
      properties:
        count:
          description: Total count of the items
          type: integer
    permission_create:
      title: Root Type for permission
      required:
      - name
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          description: service.resource.action
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        allowed_apis:
          description: APIs permission controls
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/allowed_api'
      example:
        name: prisma_access.config_mgmt.read
        description: The ability to read configurations snapshots.
        allowed_apis:
        - method: get
          path: /config/v1/config-versions
        - method: get
          path: /config/v1/jobs
    allowed_api:
      title: Root Type for allowed_api
      description: ''
      type: object
      properties:
        method:
          description: REST Method
          type: string
        path:
          description: url path
          type: string
      example:
        method: get
        path: /config/v1/config-versions
  responses:
    permissions_list:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            allOf:
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/_pagination'
            - example:
                count: 1
                items:
                - name: prisma_access.config_mgmt.read
                  description: The ability to read configurations snapshots.
                  allowed_apis:
                  - method: get
                    path: /config/v1/config-versions
                  - method: get
                    path: /config/v1/jobs
            - type: object
              properties:
                items:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    allOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/permission'
      description: Successful response.
  securitySchemes:
    Bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  /iam/v1/permissions:
    get:
      tags:
      - Permissions
      parameters:
      - name: service
        description: service
        schema: {}
        in: query
      - name: resource
        description: resource
        schema: {}
        in: query
      - name: action
        description: action
        schema: {}
        in: query
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/permissions_list'
      operationId: getpermissions
      summary: List all access permissions
      description: 'Retrieve a list of all permission entities.

        '
      security:
      - Bearer: []
  /iam/v1/permissions/{name}:
    get:
      tags:
      - Permissions
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/permission_create'
          description: Successful response - returns a single `permission`.
      operationId: getpermission
      summary: List a specific permission
      description: 'Retrieve a specific permission.

        '
      parameters:
      - name: name
        description: service.resource.action
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path
        required: true
      security:
      - Bearer: []
info:
  title: Permissions
  version: '1.0'
  description: 'Permissions description.

    '
  contact: {}
tags:
- name: Permissions
servers:
- url: https://api.sase.paloaltonetworks.com

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /iam/v1/permissions: get: operation "getpermissions": parameters: parse parameter "service": invalid schema:style:explode combination
